remarks: A uniform limit of measurable functions is measurable.  (This is just a corollary of the fact that a pointwise limit of measurable functions is measurable, see ~ mbflim .)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Mar-2015.)
statement:
mbfulm.z $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
mbfulm.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
mbfulm.f $e |- ( ph -> F : Z --> MblFn ) $.
mbfulm.u $e |- ( ph -> F ( ~~>u ` S ) G ) $.
mbfulm $p |- ( ph -> G e. MblFn ) $.
